    <div id="divBrowseSettings" data-ee="true"></div>
    <div id="divBrowseCategory" data-category="Men&gt;Men&#x2019;s Hoodies and Sweatshirts" data-list="Men&#x2019;s Hoodies and Sweatshirts"></div>

        

<script defer src="https://cdn.optimizely.com/js/28209340335.js"  type="text/plain" class="optanon-category-C0003"></script>
<script>    
    let pageType;
    let definedPageObj = {};
    window.optimizelyRecommendationData = null;

    function getPageType() {
        if (typeof dataLayerData !== "undefined") {
            pageType = dataLayerData.pageType.toLowerCase();
        }

        if (typeof dataLayerData === "undefined" && window.location.href.includes('ordercomplete')) {
            pageType = "orderconfirmation";
        }

        if (pageType === "BrowsePL" && (dataLayerData.pageTitle === "Search Results" || dataLayerData.pageType === "SearchNoResults")) {
            pageType = "searchresults";
        }
    }

    async function createPeeriusCallback(pageType) {
        let peeriusCallback = {
            "track": {
                "type": await AlignPageType(pageType),
                "lang": "en-gb",
                "smartRecs": {
                    "showAttributes": ["*"],
                },
            },
            "apiVersion": "v1_4",
            "smartRecs": function (jsonData) {
                initOptimizelyRecommendations(jsonData);
            }
        }
        let peeriusTrackObj = peeriusCallback.track;

        peeriusTrackObj = {
            ...peeriusTrackObj,
            ...definedPageObj
        }

        peeriusCallback.track = peeriusTrackObj;
        window.PeeriusCallbacks = peeriusCallback;

        let script = document.createElement('script');
        script.src =         ("//houseoffraserprd.peerius.episerver.net/tracker/peerius.page")
            script.setAttribute("defer", "");
        script.setAttribute("charset", "UTF-8");

        script.setAttribute("class", "optanon-category-C0003");
        script.setAttribute("type", "text/plain");
            document.body.append(script);
    }

    async function AlignPageType(pageType) {
        switch (pageType) {            
            case "home":            
                return "home";
            case "browsepl":
            case "events":
            case "outlet":
            case "sale":
            case "clearancehome":
                CategoryData();
                return "category";                                                                    
            case "productdetail":
                ProductDetailData();
                return "product";
            case "brands":
                BrandsData();
                return "brand";
            case "basket":
                BasketData();
                return "basket";
            case "checkout":                                
                return "checkout";
            case "wishListevent":
                await waitForDOM();
                WishListData();
                return "wishlist";
            case "orderconfirmation":
                await waitForDOM();
                await OrderData();                
                return "order";
            case "searchresults":
                await waitForDOM();
                SearchData();
                return "searchresults";
            case "notfound":
                ErrorPageData();
                return "other"
            default:
                return "other";
        }
    }

    function CategoryData() {
        definedPageObj = {
            "category": window.location.pathname.replaceAll('/', '>').replaceAll('-', ' ').slice(1)
        }
    }

    function ProductDetailData() {
        definedPageObj = {
            "product": { "refCode": true ? dataLayerData.colourVariantId : dataLayerData.colourVariantId.slice(0, -2) }
        }
    }

    function BrandsData() {
        const brandUrl = dataLayerData.rollupURL;
        const brand = brandUrl.substring(brandUrl.lastIndexOf("/") + 1)

        definedPageObj = {
            "brand": brand.replace("-", " ")
        }
    }

    function BasketData() {
        const productIds = dataLayerData.productId.split("**");
        const productPrice = dataLayerData.orderLinesPriceList.split("_");
        const productQty = dataLayerData.orderLinesQuantityList.split("_");

        let itemsObj = [];
        productPrice.forEach((price, i) => {
            productPrice[i] = parseFloat(price.substring(price.indexOf("=") + 1));
        })

        productIds.forEach((id, i) => {
            itemsObj.push({
                "refCode": true ? id.slice(0, -3) : id.slice(0, -5),
                "price": productPrice[i],
                "qty": parseInt(productQty[i].substring(productQty[i].indexOf("=") + 1))
            })
        })

        definedPageObj = {
            "basket": {
                "items": itemsObj,
                "currency": dataLayerData.currency,
            }
        }
    }

    function WishListData() {
        let itemsObj = [];
        const productLines = document.querySelectorAll('.wishlist-page__card-container .product-line-card');
        productLines.forEach(productLine => {
            itemsObj.push({
                "refCode": true ? productLine.getAttribute('data-productid').slice(0, -3) : productLine.getAttribute('data-productid').slice(0, -5),
            })
        })

        definedPageObj = {
            "wishList": {
                "items": itemsObj,
            }
        }
    }

    function OrderData() {        
        let itemsObj = [];
        
        const orderComplete = document.querySelector('.OrderComplete');

        const total = parseFloat(orderComplete.getAttribute('data-ordertotal'));
        const subTotal = parseFloat(orderComplete.getAttribute('data-ordersubtotal'));
        const deliveryTotal = parseFloat(orderComplete.getAttribute('data-orderdelivery'));

        const orderId = orderComplete.getAttribute('data-orderid');
        const products = JSON.parse(orderComplete.getAttribute('data-orderdetails'));

        products.forEach(product => {
            itemsObj.push({
                "refCode": product.variantId.slice(0, -3),
                "price": product.lineTotal,
                "qty": product.quantity,
            })
        })

        definedPageObj = {
            "order": {
                "orderNo": orderId,
                "items": itemsObj,
                "currency": currencyFormatterConfig.activeCurrency,
                "subtotal": subTotal,
                "shipping": deliveryTotal,
                "total": total,
            }
        }    

        window['optimizely'] = window['optimizely'] || [];
        window['optimizely'].push({
            type: "event",
            eventName: "trackRevenue",
            tags: {
                revenue: parseInt(total * 100),
            }
        });
    }

    function SearchData() {
        const searchTerm = dataLayerData.siteSearchTerm;
        const products = document.querySelectorAll('.plp-products-container li');
        const totalNumberOfResults = document.querySelector('#FiltersAndProductsWrapper .totalProducts').innerText;
        let topResults = [];

        for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
            topResults.push({
                "refCode": true ? products[i].getAttribute('li-productid') : products[i].getAttribute('li-productid').slice(0, -2)
            })
        }

        definedPageObj = {
            "searchResults": {
                "term": searchTerm,
                "totalNumberOfResults": totalNumberOfResults,
                "resultsOnPage": products.length,
                "topResults": topResults,
            }
        }
    }

    function ErrorPageData() {
        definedPageObj = {
            "customAttributes": {
                "name": "Error",
                "pageType": "404"
            }
        }
    }

    function initOptimizelyRecommendations(jsonData) {
        window.optimizelyRecommendationData = jsonData;
    }

    function waitForDOM() {
        return new Promise(resolve => {
            if (document.readyState === "loading") {
                document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
                    resolve();
                })
            } else {
                resolve();
            }
        })
    }

    getPageType();
    createPeeriusCallback(pageType);
</script>

  CurrentSite:'www.houseoffraser.co.uk',
  SrcLang: 'en',

    <script>
        (function (window) {
            // Tracking needs to wait for deferred scripts to complete
            if (document.readyState !== 'loading') {
                trackEvent();
            } else {
                document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', trackEvent);
            }

            function trackEvent() {
                try {
                    var segment = window.segment;
                    if (!(segment &&
                        typeof segment.getTrackingEnabled === "function" &&
                        segment.getTrackingEnabled())) return;

                    var json = {"isEnabled":true,"creative":"FRAS_QuickFixes 05-09-24b JC","name":"FRAS_QuickFixes 05-09-24b JC","position":"FRAS_QuickFixes","promotionId":"31653"};

                    var eventData = new segment.PromotionViewedData(
                        json.creative,
                        json.name,
                        json.position,
                        json.promotionId
                    );
                    segment.trackPromotionViewed(eventData);
                } catch (e) {
                    console.error(e);
                }
            }
        }(window))
    </script>

        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('.FooterHeader').click(function () {
                    if ($(this).children('span').is(':visible')) {
                        $(this).children('span').toggleClass('glyphicon-chevron-right').toggleClass('glyphicon-chevron-down');

                });
